name: mitreAttackSpread
title: MITRE ATT&CK Alert Incident Spread
subTitle: Detailed table view of Alerts and Incidents linked to MITRE ATT&CK records

metadata.description: Provides a consolidated look into Alert and Incident threats under MITRE ATT&CK records. Requires MITRE ATT&CK Enrichment Framework installed and MITRE ATT&CK records ingested into FortiSOAR via MITRE ATT&CK Connector.
